translation.yourJourney: Your journey with Awesome Code experiences starts here.
translation.desccodeshare: CodeShare - a platform on which you can share and work simultaneously with others on code.
translation.emailConfirmedMessage: Your email has been successfully confirmed. You can now log in.
translation.notEmailConfirmed: Your email address has not been confirmed.
translation.pleaseConfAccount: Please check your mailbox to confirm your account.
translation.confirmDeleteSnippet: Are you sure you want to delete this snippet?
translation.noSnippets: It's still empty here :( Start working on a new document and it will be assigned to your account!
translation.noPremium: You don't have a premium account. You can't create more than 10 snippets.
translation.over10Documents: You have exceeded the limit of 10 snippets! The document will not be assigned to your account.
